name: skypager
description: skypager is a framework for managing a portfolio of applications, modules, and components. Skypager makes working with react, babel, webpack and other ecosystems a breeze.
author: Jonathan Soeder <jon@chicago.com

scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.prerelease:patch: exit-on-dirty-git && npm version patch --no-git-tag && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump monorepo version to prep for release'
scripts.prerelease:minor: exit-on-dirty-git && npm version minor --no-git-tag && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump monorepo version to prep for release'
